 

Abhimanyu and Ayush have recently learned short range pistol shooting during their winter vacations. Now, Ayush has challenged Abhimanyu for a match to prove his mettle.

During the match, they will try to shoot the target in turns. Ayush will shoot first. The probability of shooting the target each time is  p/q  for Ayush while  r/s  for Abhimanyu. The one who shoots at the target first will win the match.

Find the probability that Ayush will win the match.
 

Input
 
First line contains a integer T denoting the number of test cases.

Each test case contains a single line containing four integers p,q,r,s 


Output

Print the probability that Ayush will win the match upto 5 decimal places.

 

Constraints

1<= T <= 1000

1<= p, q, r, s <=1000

0 < p/q < 1

0 < r/s < 1

 

Example
Input:
1
1 3 1 3

Output:
0.60000
